name: punch-out-version
description: Calculates the version at release time and adds a tag accordingly to Git and to the build.
author: Munir Husseini

inputs.name: packageName
inputs.label: A name to use with the version tag.

inputs.name: releaseBranch
inputs.label: The name of the branch that contains the release version of the code.

inputs.name: developBranch
inputs.label: The name of the branch that contains the beta version of the code.

inputs.name: patchBranch
inputs.label: The name of the branch that contains hotfixes and other patches.

inputs.name: betaLabel
inputs.label: The label to use for versions from the develop branch.

inputs.name: label
inputs.label: A regex describing which part of the Git branch's name to use as the version label.

inputs.name: outputVariable
inputs.label: The name of the variable to store the generated version into.
